description:
## Objective 
Fix the unusual behavior of spinner in `Add Beneficiary` activity in mifos-mobile

## Description
For every failed request to add beneficiary, the spinner duplicates all the spinner items. The task here is to fix this behavior.

More details can be found on the following issue page  on GitHub:
https://github.com/openMF/mifos-mobile/issues/1230

## How to get help
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or  ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos).
name: Mifos Mobile: Fix the spinner behaviour
